  • ccs_root :: Maybe CostCentreStack
  • ccs_depth :: Word
  • ccs_scc_count :: Word64
  • ccs_selected :: Word
  • ccs_time_ticks :: Word
  • ccs_mem_alloc :: Word64
  • ccs_inherited_alloc :: Word64
  • ccs_inherited_ticks :: Word
}

}

data GenClosure b
  • = ConstrClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • ptrArgs :: ![b]
    • dataArgs :: ![Word]
    • pkg :: !String
    • modl :: !String
    • name :: !String
    }
  • | FunClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • ptrArgs :: ![b]
    • dataArgs :: ![Word]
    }
  • | ThunkClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • ptrArgs :: ![b]
    • dataArgs :: ![Word]
    }
  • | SelectorClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • selectee :: !b
    }
  • | PAPClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • arity :: !HalfWord
    • n_args :: !HalfWord
    • fun :: !b
    • payload :: ![b]
    }
  • | APClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • arity :: !HalfWord
    • n_args :: !HalfWord
    • fun :: !b
    • payload :: ![b]
    }
  • | APStackClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • fun :: !b
    • payload :: ![b]
    }
  • | IndClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • indirectee :: !b
    }
  • | BCOClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • instrs :: !b
    • literals :: !b
    • bcoptrs :: !b
    • arity :: !HalfWord
    • size :: !HalfWord
    • bitmap :: ![Word]
    }
  • | BlackholeClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • indirectee :: !b
    }
  • | ArrWordsClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • bytes :: !Word
    • arrWords :: ![Word]
    }
  • | MutArrClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • mccPtrs :: !Word
    • mccSize :: !Word
    • mccPayload :: ![b]
    }
  • | SmallMutArrClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • mccPtrs :: !Word
    • mccPayload :: ![b]
    }
  • | MVarClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • queueHead :: !b
    • queueTail :: !b
    • value :: !b
    }
  • | IOPortClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • queueHead :: !b
    • queueTail :: !b
    • value :: !b
    }
  • | MutVarClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • var :: !b
    }
  • | BlockingQueueClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • link :: !b
    • blackHole :: !b
    • owner :: !b
    • queue :: !b
    }
  • | WeakClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • cfinalizers :: !b
    • key :: !b
    • value :: !b
    • finalizer :: !b
    • weakLink :: !(Maybe b)
    }
  • | TSOClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • link :: !b
    • global_link :: !b
    • tsoStack :: !b
    • trec :: !b
    • blocked_exceptions :: !b
    • bq :: !b
    • thread_label :: !(Maybe b)
    • what_next :: !WhatNext
    • why_blocked :: !WhyBlocked
    • flags :: ![TsoFlags]
    • threadId :: !Word64
    • saved_errno :: !Word32
    • tso_dirty :: !Word32
    • alloc_limit :: !Int64
    • tot_stack_size :: !Word32
    • prof :: !(Maybe StgTSOProfInfo)
    }
  • | StackClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • stack_size :: !Word32
    • stack_dirty :: !Word8
    • stack_marking :: !Word8
    }
  • | IntClosure {
    • ptipe :: PrimType
    • intVal :: !Int
    }
  • | WordClosure {
    • ptipe :: PrimType
    • wordVal :: !Word
    }
  • | Int64Closure {
    • ptipe :: PrimType
    • int64Val :: !Int64
    }
  • | Word64Closure {
    • ptipe :: PrimType
    • word64Val :: !Word64
    }
  • | AddrClosure {
    • ptipe :: PrimType
    • addrVal :: !(Ptr ())
    }
  • | FloatClosure {
    • ptipe :: PrimType
    • floatVal :: !Float
    }
  • | DoubleClosure {
    • ptipe :: PrimType
    • doubleVal :: !Double
    }
  • | OtherClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    • hvalues :: ![b]
    • rawWords :: ![Word]
    }
  • | UnsupportedClosure {
    • info :: !StgInfoTable
    }
  • | UnknownTypeWordSizedPrimitive {
    • wordVal :: !Word
    }
name: GenClosure APClosure APStackClosure AddrClosure ArrWordsClosure BCOClosure BlackholeClosure BlockingQueueClosure ConstrClosure DoubleClosure FloatClosure FunClosure IOPortClosure IndClosure Int64Closure IntClosure MVarClosure MutArrClosure MutVarClosure OtherClosure PAPClosure SelectorClosure SmallMutArrClosure StackClosure TSOClosure ThunkClosure UnknownTypeWordSizedPrimitive UnsupportedClosure WeakClosure Word64Closure WordClosure addrVal alloc_limit arity arrWords bcoptrs bitmap blackHole blocked_exceptions bq bytes cfinalizers dataArgs doubleVal finalizer flags floatVal fun global_link hvalues indirectee info instrs int64Val intVal key link literals mccPayload mccPtrs mccSize modl n_args name owner payload pkg prof ptipe ptrArgs queue queueHead queueTail rawWords saved_errno selectee size stack_dirty stack_marking stack_size threadId thread_label tot_stack_size trec tsoStack tso_dirty value var weakLink what_next why_blocked word64Val wordVal

data PrimType
  • = PInt
  • | PWord
  • | PInt64
  • | PWord64
  • | PAddr
  • | PFloat
  • | PDouble
name: PrimType PAddr PDouble PFloat PInt PInt64 PWord PWord64
WhatNext ThreadComplete ThreadInterpret ThreadKilled ThreadRunGHC WhatNextUnknownValue

WhyBlocked BlockedOnBlackHole BlockedOnCCall BlockedOnCCall_Interruptible BlockedOnDelay BlockedOnDoProc BlockedOnMVar BlockedOnMVarRead BlockedOnMsgThrowTo BlockedOnRead BlockedOnSTM BlockedOnWrite NotBlocked ThreadMigrating WhyBlockedUnknownValue
TsoFlags TsoAllocLimit TsoBlockx TsoFlagsUnknownValue TsoInterruptible TsoLocked TsoMarked TsoSqueezed TsoStoppedOnBreakpoint

}

data GenStackFrame b
  • = UpdateFrame {
    • info_tbl :: !StgInfoTable
    • updatee :: !b
    }
  • | CatchFrame {
    • info_tbl :: !StgInfoTable
    • handler :: !b
    }
  • | CatchStmFrame {
    • info_tbl :: !StgInfoTable
    • catchFrameCode :: !b
    • handler :: !b
    }
  • | CatchRetryFrame {
    • info_tbl :: !StgInfoTable
    • running_alt_code :: !Word
    • first_code :: !b
    • alt_code :: !b
    }
  • | AtomicallyFrame {
    • info_tbl :: !StgInfoTable
    • atomicallyFrameCode :: !b
    • result :: !b
    }
  • | UnderflowFrame {
    • info_tbl :: !StgInfoTable
    • nextChunk :: !(GenStgStackClosure b)
    }
  • | StopFrame {
    • info_tbl :: !StgInfoTable
    }
  • | RetSmall {
    • info_tbl :: !StgInfoTable
    • stack_payload :: ![GenStackField b]
    }
  • | RetBig {
    • info_tbl :: !StgInfoTable
    • stack_payload :: ![GenStackField b]
    }
  • | RetFun {
    • info_tbl :: !StgInfoTable
    • retFunSize :: !Word
    • retFunFun :: !b
    • retFunPayload :: ![GenStackField b]
    }
  • | RetBCO {
    • info_tbl :: !StgInfoTable
    • bco :: !b
    • bcoArgs :: ![GenStackField b]
    }
name: GenStackFrame AtomicallyFrame CatchFrame CatchRetryFrame CatchStmFrame RetBCO RetBig RetFun RetSmall StopFrame UnderflowFrame UpdateFrame alt_code atomicallyFrameCode bco bcoArgs catchFrameCode first_code handler info_tbl nextChunk result retFunFun retFunPayload retFunSize running_alt_code stack_payload updatee
